The Hack Philosophy@HackCon EU 2015.

August 30, 2015 â€” 16:00

Slides on the hacking Philosophy. Why we hack, and why it might be interpreted wrongly by the wider community. This talk was done for HackCon EU 2015, a conference for hackathon organisers.
